suggestions.original: To improve the line texture in the artwork, consider adding more defined and varied lines to the roof of the house to enhance depth and detail. Additionally, incorporating more intricate line work in the background elements can create a richer texture and add to the overall composition. Experimenting with different line weights and styles can also help to distinguish various elements and bring more visual interest to the piece.
